markdownRemark.html: This talk will cover an overview of the core features and patterns of Vue.js. We'll see some demos that show how easy it is to get started with the framework which will show the Vuetify material component framework, and the front end testing framework Cypress.io.

frontmatter.title: Intro to Vue.js
frontmatter.presenter_bio: Ian is Node.js engineer who dabbles with DevOps & Frontend. He is a big fan of keeping things simple and adopting web standards.

fields.presenter_bio_html: Ian is Node.js engineer who dabbles with DevOps & Frontend. He is a big fan of keeping things simple and adopting web standards.
